alert.note: Alert for DeWitt; Lavaca (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 9:44PM CDT until June 21 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... DeWitt County in south central Texas... Southwestern Lavaca County in south central Texas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 944 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ezzell to near Weesatche, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cuero, Yoakum, Yorktown, Shiner, Thomaston, Ezzell, Hochheim, Westhoff, Worthing, Koerth, Edgar, Gruenau, Terryville, New Davy, Meyersville, Mont, Sweet Home, Arneckville, Mount Olive and Concrete. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
